languages.text: {n}Это вы создаете помехи. Лишь сейчас внимание К'тан обращается к вам — предшествовавшая битва была только рефлекторным сопротивлением нечеловеческого разума, поглощенного спектром совсем иных мыслей и переживаний. Но теперь Он думает о вас — и мысли Его столь весомы, что вы чувствуете и знаете их. Он желает прекращения конфронтации. Он способен разрешить конфликт выгодным для всех образом.{/n}

{n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Это вы создаете помехи. Лишь сейчас внимание К'тан обращается к вам — предшествовавшая битва была только рефлекторным сопротивлением нечеловеческого разума, поглощенного спектром совсем иных мыслей и переживаний. Но теперь Он думает о вас — и мысли Его столь весомы, что вы чувствуете и знаете их. Он желает прекращения конфронтации. Он способен разрешить конфликт выгодным для всех образом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are the one who creates the disturbance. C'Tan only now turns its gaze to you — the previous battle had only been the reflexive resistance of an inhuman mind, absorbed by an absolutely different spectrum of thoughts and feelings. But now, He is thinking of you — His thoughts so powerful that you can feel them and know them. He wishes to end the confrontation. He is capable of resolving the conflict in a way that would be beneficial to all the parties involved.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

C'Tan only now turns its gaze to you — the previous battle had only been the reflexive resistance of an inhuman mind, absorbed by an absolutely different spectrum of thoughts and feelings. But now, He is thinking of you — His thoughts so powerful that you can feel them and know them. He wishes to end the confrontation. He is capable of resolving the conflict in a way that would be beneficial to all the parties involved.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces perturbations proviennent de vous. Ce n'est que maintenant que l'Écharde C'tan vous accorde son attention. La bataille n'était que la résistance réflexe d'un esprit non humain absorbé par des pensées et des sentiments d'une nature complètement différente. Mais à présent, il pense à vous et ses pensées sont presque tangibles, au point que vous les ressentez et les comprenez. Il cherche à mettre fin à l'affrontement. Il est capable de résoudre le conflit de manière favorable pour toutes les parties impliquées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces perturbations proviennent de vous. Ce n'est que maintenant que l'Écharde C'tan vous accorde son attention. La bataille n'était que la résistance réflexe d'un esprit non humain absorbé par des pensées et des sentiments d'une nature complètement différente. Mais à présent, il pense à vous et ses pensées sont presque tangibles, au point que vous les ressentez et les comprenez. Il cherche à mettre fin à l'affrontement. Il est capable de résoudre le conflit de manière favorable pour toutes les parties impliquées.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Tú eres la causa de las perturbaciones. Es ahora cuando el C'tan centra su atención en ti, pues la batalla anterior no era más que la resistencia refleja de una mente alienígena absorbida en una marea de pensamientos y respuestas ajenos. Pero ahora está pensando en ti, y Sus pensamientos son tan corpóreos que puedes sentirlos y entenderlos. Quiere poner fin a la confrontación. Es capaz de resolver el conflicto de una forma satisfactoria para todos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tú eres {mf|el|la} que crea las perturbaciones. Es ahora cuando el C'Tan dirige su mirada hacia ti: la batalla anterior no era más que la resistencia refleja de una mente inhumana absorbida por una marea de pensamientos y sensaciones ajenos. Pero ahora está pensando en ti, y Sus pensamientos son tan potentes que puedes sentirlos y entenderlos. Quiere poner fin a la confrontación. Es capaz de resolver el conflicto de una forma satisfactoria para todas las partes.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}阻挠祂的人正是你。此刻，星神碎片将目光投向了你。在之前的战斗中，你的对手仅仅是某种反射性的异形阻力，被各种各样的思想与情感裹挟。但此刻，祂正在思考你的一切。祂的思想是如此无处不在，你完全能够感觉到祂的思想，理解祂。祂想要结束这场对峙，而且祂有能力带来所有人都希望的结果。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阻挠祂的人正是你。此刻，星神将目光投向了你。在之前的战斗中，你的对手仅仅是某种反射性的异形阻力，被各种各样的思想与情感裹挟。但此刻，祂正在思考你的一切。祂的思想是如此强大，你完全能够感觉到这些思想，理解它们。祂想要结束这场对峙，而且祂有能力为所有人带来有利的结果，从而结束这场冲突。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Du bist der Grund für diese Hindernisse. Erst jetzt richtet das C'tan-Fragment seinen Fokus auf dich, denn die Schlacht war nichts als der reflektorische Widerstand eines außerirdischen Verstandes, der von gänzlich anderen Gedanken und Reaktionen absorbiert wurde. Aber nun denkt es über dich nach, und seine Gedanken sind der derart körperlich, dass du sie spüren und lesen kannst. Es will die Konfrontation beenden. Es ist dazu fähig, sie auf eine Weise beizulegen, von der alle profitieren würden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist es, {mf|der|die} die Störung verursacht. Der C'tan wendet seinen Blick erst jetzt in deine Richtung. Die vorherige Schlacht war nur der reflexartige Widerstand eines nicht-menschlichen Verstands, der von einer völlig anderen Palette an Gedanken und Gefühlen erfüllt ist. Nun aber denkt er an dich, und seine Gedanken sind so mächtig, dass du sie spürst, dass du sie kennst. Er will der Konfrontation ein Ende bereiten. Er ist in der Lage, den Konflikt auf eine Weise beizulegen, von der alle Beteiligten profitieren.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}あなたこそがこの障害の原因なのだ。ク＝タン・シャードは今、あなたに目を向けている。これまでの戦いは、まったく異なる思考や感情に吸収された、異質な精神への反射的な抵抗でしかなかった。しかし今、「それ」はあなたのことを考えている。そしてその思考は、あなたが感じ、知悉できるぐらい有形のものとなっている。「それ」は対立を終わらせようとしている。「それ」は関係者全員にとって有益な方法で対立を解決することができるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたこそがこの障害の原因なのだ。ク＝タン・シャードは今、あなたに目を向けている。これまでの戦いは、まったく異なる思考や感情に吸収された、異質な精神への反射的な抵抗でしかなかった。しかし今、「それ」はあなたのことを考えている。そしてその思考は、あなたが感じ、知悉できるぐらい有形のものとなっている。「それ」は対立を終わらせようとしている。「それ」は関係者全員にとって有益な方法で対立を解決することができるのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Bu engellerin sebebi sensin. Savaşın tamamen farklı bir düşünce ve tepki aralığına sıkışmış yabancı bir zihnin refleksif direncinden başka bir şey olmaması nedeniyle C'tan Parçası, odağını sana anca çevirebiliyor. Şimdi seni düşünüyor, düşünceleri öyle maddesel ki onları hissedip biliyorsun. Yüzleşmenin sona ermesini istiyor. Herkese fayda sağlayabilecek bir çözüm bulabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are the cause of these hindrances. Only now does the C'tan Shard turn Its focus to you, for the battle was nothing more than the reflexive resistance of an alien mind absorbed in a completely different range of thoughts and responses. But now, It is thinking about you, and Its thoughts are so corporeal that you can sense them and know them. It seeks an end to the confrontation. It is capable of resolving it in a way that would benefit all.{/n}
